content.detailedDescription:
I don't remember the exact year, month or day but there was no place above to say that so i am saying it here but i remember the craft and hope to see it again.

my sister and i were heading to the house for lunch after playing in our woods.  a shadow on the ground startled us and above us about 3-400 feet was this giant boomerang shaped craft.  

it was completely silent and as it very slowly moved i stood watching it trying to see everything i could.  we were always seeing strange craft over our house with various shapes and sizes.  when i saw the shadow i thought there was an airplane going over because we were located almost on the flight path for the air national guard.  however when i saw craft it was like 2 wings joined together in a v shape without a tail.  i knew it couldn't be an airplane because there were no engines, no tail and no control surfaces of any kind in sight.  after my little sister ran to the house i stood and watched the craft for about ten minutes or more until it finally disappeared over the trees of the other farm across the road.

i told a teacher about the experience a day or so later and discovered several others in the area had seen the very same thing including adults.  towards the end of that week someone from the military was at our school with pictures of an aircraft he called the flying wing.  quite a few of the other kids that had seen it decided that was what they had seen but i was not taken in by it and began asking questions.  

he became quite irritated with me when i asked him where the engines were and he held up the picture again.  i told him, "not the engines on your picture, the engines on the one i saw."  after a few more minutes of attempting to dissuade me that what i saw was his flying wing, he told me i had a vivid imagination and turned to leave.

i joined the air force after i grew up and began then to try to find out what i had seen and made a trip to where they had a decommissioned "flying wing" to take a good look at it.  i noticed the resemblance was quite a lot like what i saw but it had 4 very big, very visible engines as well as a lot of windows.  it was also about 6 to 8 times smaller than what i saw.

i have been going over this for many, many years trying to find anything it could have been and still have not seen anything quite like that craft and i still search for an explanation.  i also search to see anything like some of the others that used to come over our house.  some were shaped like a cigar with an egg stuck on each end.  some were round, oval and some were even square.  someday i will find the answer and when i do i know it will be something from another place.  

i watch the night sky and wait; i search the internet for any shape that might fit the specs of what i saw; i just hope they hurry because with my health the way it is i would like to see one again before i die, just to see it again and relive that summer day so very long ago.

i don't have any photos as i didn���t have a camera back then and i do not draw very well at all.  however, now i carry a camera all of the time and take a lot of pictures of clouds searching for anything standing out that does not belong.  if some of the pictures i have taken in the last few months turn out not to be digital glitches, i may be able to report a current sighting.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped about the size of 2 747's no marking visible. no windows, no doors, no engines visible.

content.detailedDescription:
At 7:30pm me and friend (micheal) are smoking at a school called baker school. we were standing in the school's north field, when all of sudden i heard at noise (it sound like when jets make noise) but only this noise wasnt that loud. but you can clearly hear it. the noise was coming from mountains north of us. 

so i said what the heck is that noise, then i turned to my right an i was lookin west, when all of sudden i saw a "triangle shape" ufo it had 4 lights 2 white, green, and red,..... so i said wtf is that!!!!! i new immediatley it was no ordinary plane becuase the ufo made a very soft turn, it then turned goin north to the mountains. i couldnt see it after..........


then 2 minutes later another ufo flys over us this one looked like a bright star or a bright pearl flying, and the light was in a triangle.. you could bearly see the triangle around it... it was a redish color..... it flew over us coming from the west then flying over us then goin east...

it then started dissapearing when it just left the earth goin into space!..............

i am not fakng this story!!!! i wont waist my time writing this story!!............ i wont forget that moment!!!!!!!

(an my reaction to the ufo) i said wtf im i looking at... i said damm i cant believe it.... i've always wanted to see ufo i finaly saw one

i aint no artist but i drawed some pics on how the ufo looked....

1st picture is the first ufo
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw a triangle ufo fly over, then 2 minutes later a bright ufo light

content.detailedDescription: Approximately at around 10:00pm/cst here in north padre island texas, the closest city being corpus christi, tx., which is about 20 minutes from where we were this evening of july 2002, sitting around a beach fire was my boyfriend and i.  i love looking at the stars so i was 90% completely lounged back in a beach chair gazing at the stars, when all of a sudden i saw a triangular formation of 3 lights in the sky.  they were moving very slowly at about 2 mph.  i could see what appeared like a very light yellowish white laser lines connecting all three lights which made it appear as one large object.  i'm almost convinced it was one large object the size of a football field about 3-4 miles in the sky, because you couldn't see any stars through this triangular formation.  ----all of a sudden as i spotted it, i said to my boyfriend:  "oh my god!  what the hell is that, as i pointed up at the sky at this object.....My boyfriend also said:  "oh my god!----as he saw the object too.....The object proceeded to move forward at about 2 mph and then it slowly turned at an angle towards the left.  as it turned slowly to change direction, the 3 lights faded out or turned off completely, and the object could not be seen anymore by us that night..........I want to state that i'm convinced this was not some "stealth bomber" from the nearby army base, because they are wide triangular aircraft........This object that we saw was a very long triangular object the size or length of a football field, and made no noise whatsoever as it propelled itself somehow. to me, it was definitely not any kind of aircraft that i've ever seen, because i love jets and aircraft.  as far as i'm concerned, it was not any type of aircraft from this world!-----i don't care what anybody says!----completely and truthfully told......A beachbum from corpus christi, tx!---ps...And don't think i was smoking anything funny to have seen this, because i have no respect for drugs or druggies!
content.summary: Triangular ufo with 3 lights

content.detailedDescription:
Coming home from a run to walmart. i noticed a light in the sky, it was dancing and was various colors. i thought it was wierd that it wasn't moving, it was just changing colors. like a blinking christmas light i saw red, blue, green, yellow. i found it wierd that it was sitting there so i went to get my digital camera and took a picture of it. well in the digital camera the lights where all blue and it looked like it was dancing. i went back in, an dcame back out an hour later, and saw it was still there. so i took another picture. and did it again a half hour later, finally at 11:00 pm i went out to see if it was still there, and it wasn't.

there is an airport near here, its a private airport, only small planes and helocopters take off from there. on occasion a blimp lands there, but there was no event going on that would have a need for a blimp. helecoptesr are only seen there during the day, at the airport they give tours in them.

so what this was that i saw.. i have no idea.
content.summary: Saw a light dancing in the sky

content.detailedDescription: It was 4:46am on 9/12/2001 the day after 9/11. i was working the grave yard shift as a security patrol officer. i just dropped off my last nightly report at one of my properties.I looked to the east over where lake matthews is located and saw two objects hovering over the area, i could not believe what i was seeing, first of all i knew that is was not a aircraft due to the us government not allowing any aircraft in the air after the attack on 9/11 except military aircraft. the objects did not have nay navigation lights or sound. the ufos color were a bright orange-red color, like two big fireballs.I watched the objects for about 3 minutes and then they were gone. i was amazed and could not believe what i witnessed, i told a couple of coworkers and family members and they thought i was crazy. trust me i know what i saw and i believe that soon something big will happen.
content.summary: Morning after 9/11/2001  i saw two bright orange lights!

content.detailedDescription: It was a late thursday night. my dad was going to take the trash out. i was only 8 at the time so i went with him because i was scared to stay in the house alone (i was 8). so hes taking the trash down to the curb and i look up and see this object with flasing colorful lights. i was amazed. i didnt see it for very long. maybe 15 secs. it was way up the street and very close to the ground maybe just 100 feet above the houses. my street is a hill so as this thing was moving up, the houses got in the way. i remmber wanting to run after it but i was scared. by the time the ufo wasn't in site my dad was finished with the garbage. i told him about it walking back to the house but he didnt belive me. so i just went on with my night as usual.
content.summary: A classic shaped ufo. on the end of the saucer there was colorful lights blinking.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving from dulce new mexico to pagosa springs colorado along a dirt road short cut.  we came upon 2 horses laying by the side of the dirt road.  the horses were dead.  i stopped the car, got out and walked up to the horses.  i noticed 3 more horses in the field nearby that also appeared to be dead.  the two horses by the road side had no legs.  their legs were gone from the knees down.  the two horses by the road side had no lower jaws.  the cheek flesh and muscle was also missing.  both ears on both horses by the road were gone.  one of the horses in the field appeared to be in the same condition.  because of the way the other two horses were laying, i could not see their legs or head due to heavy sage brush.

i returned to my car and told my wife there were horses in the field that also looked dead.

i told my wife they may have been hit by trucks driving down the road.  i told her that perhaps a herd had been crossing the road and were struck by a large truck, thereby severing the legs of some of the animals and destroying their faces. the remaining three horses then staggered into the field and died.  

we then continued down the road towards our dinner date.

after eating dinner, we returned to dulce, nm using the same dirt road short cut.  

my wife asked me to slow down because we were nearing the place where the horses had been.  she did not want me to hit them.  as we approached the site, we immediately noticed that the two horses by the road were gone.  i could not see into the field to determine if the other 3 horses were there or not because it was dark by then.

i slowed to around 5 miles per hour to scan the road side and field as best we could under the dark conditions.

my wife then said "look at that in the sky."  i leaned down towards her lap to look out her window.  i could see a dim white light to the north towards archuleta mesa.  the light then began to move south.  then the light moved east and then north and passed in front of the nearly full moon.  as it passed in front of the moon i could clearly see the shape of the craft.  it looked like a long cylindrical...Butane tank (but i checked that it looked like a cigar..In the check box there), but really it looked like a long butane tank/cylinder.  it was followed by what i thought were two smaller black objects, almost flying in formation.

by now, i was looking out my driver window and over my left shoulder.

my wife said "let's just get out of here."  so i started to drive again, looking over my shoulder at the object, again just a light because it was not silhouetted against the moon.  the object then descended and circled directly behind and above our car.  i looked up through our sun roof and saw that the object/light was right above us and slightly behind us.  

the last thing i remember is looking through my sunroof at the light.

then we were just driving along like nothing had happened.

we arrived home shortly after 10:00 pm. and that's significant because our dinner dates only last about 3 hours.  we are almost always home by 8:00 or 8:30.  but this time we did not arrive home until 10:10 pm.  

it just does not add up.

1. dirt road driving
2. wife saw it and pointed it out
3. i thought the object was a star
4. cylinder/cigar/elongated butane tank, moving and circling our car
5. i felt no emotion.  i drove away.  confusion while at home after.
6. i don't know how i lost sight of the object.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Horse mutilation, possible human abduction

content.detailedDescription:
Every year the blue angels do an air show over lake washington when they are having the hydroplane races on the lake.  i live about a 1/2 mile from the lake and was at home.  i heard a loud low flying jet pass over my house and i knew the show was on.  i quickly grabbed my camera and ran outside to get some photos of the jets as they did the show. 

 when i got outside you could not see or hear the jets at all.  i took the time to set all the functions on my camera which were manual settings, asa or iso 400 ( film speed ) and shutter speed at 1/250th of a second so the planes would be sharp ( stop action ) and the 300mm lens set to infinity as i did not expect the planes to be any closer focus than this.  while i waited i did a few test photos of clouds that would be in the direction of the jets as they did the show over the lake and island.

within five minutes of me setting the camera up the show began and i took some great photos of the blue angels in formation etc.

  when i uploaded the images after the show had ended i noticed a speck near one of the clouds i had photographed during my first few test shots.  i blew the image up in photoshop and saw it was a disk or oval shaped object quite a ways out near the bottom right corner of a large puffy cloud.  

i don't know what the object is as the camera resolution is only 8 megapixels
and when enlarged the image falls apart pretty badly.  it is oval shaped though, has a highlight on it making it look reflective metallic silver colored, and can be seen in a different area on one other photograph but only very faintly. i did not see the craft or object when i took the photographs at all.  too far away to see with the naked eye at that distance i suspect, as i did not notice it when looking through the 300mm lens.

one other note is they restrict the air space near the fly zone when they do the air show for safety purposes.

i will attach the photos that are relevant to this incident.  i have a photo of the cloud and circled the spot where the speck (oval object)is.  i did nothing to this image from photoshop at all.  then i blew the image of the disk up as large as i could and still hold detail.  then i blew the oval shaped object up a second time, using unsharp mask, contrast and hues to try and define it a bit clearer.  the photograph of the blue angel plane is to show the distance proportionally and in the same direction as the cloud was when i photographed the speck earlier in the show with the same camera settings.  maybe you have seen this object somewhere else in your files? hope it helps!
content.summary: After photographing the blue angels flying show i uploaded digital photos i took and saw a speck near a cloud i photographed.  when enlarged you can see the oval shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
A friend who lives a few blocks away called and said she saw strange objects in the sky. i went outside and saw the same strange objects in the sky. we learned the next day that i was actually looking in the opposite direction so we think this was happening in two places.  to me, they appeared to be several miles away, somewhat near lax airport, actually, but there was nothing about them that was anything like the activity of a plane or planes.

they were like small bouncing balls of light. maybe three to five going at one time. they bounced in circular patterns but not like making one circle, they were all doing their own bouncing. i can think of an analogy to maybe juggling balls. i seem to think they were changing color but i can't really recall. there were three of us who saw them and then my friend and her roommate saw them too. we watched for about ten minutes. they were still there when we went inside but were gone by about 12:15 (i have a text from the friend around that time that says they disappeared).

does this sound like something that is actually identifiable? the weird part to me is that i saw them in a different area than my friend. she thought they were very close to my house. i thought they were very close to her house.
content.summary: Bouncing balls of light

content.detailedDescription:
We went outside in the middle of the night for a leisurely stroll.
it all started when we saw the flying saucer flying over.
it was very fast and strange and didn't stop till we started looking at it.
it got mad and started spurting out it's energy from it's bottom.
it reacted to out curiousity with it's own curiosity.
we believe it was watching us and analyzing us.
we will never be the same from this experiment.
we wanted to take photos but my cell phone doesn't have a camera and i don't own a camera.
it went away as fast as it came leaving only a streak of jet behind it in its wake.
we will never forget the experience of such a phenomenon. 
we lie awake in bed expecting it to return...
content.shape: Blimp,  Boomerang,  Bullet,  Missile,  Cigar,  Cone,  Chevron,  Circle,  Cross,  Cylinder,  Diamond,  Disc,  Egg,  Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Saturn-like,  Sphere,  Square,  Rectagular,  Star-like,  Teardrop,  Triangle,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: It was frisbee like and went really fast

content.detailedDescription:
My friend dave and i were playing cards in my garage in san clemente (off camino de estrella).  we walked out to the street to grab something out of the car and were standing by the car smoking when i noticed some lights off in the distance.  this was not unusual as camp pendleton is only 15mi from the house and the san diego naval base is about 60mi south as well so aircraft were not uncommon.  

we just sat smoking for about five minutes and were slowly walking and talking towards the garage to play some more cards.  he asked me if i heard something and i did.  it was kinda like a very loud phane with a slight metallic whine (almost like a tuned down jet engine of sorts).  we both watched this "thing" get closer from the north heading south almost directly over pch (about .5 miles to the west of us,  pch runs along the shore all the way to oceanside).  it was circular in shape and was moving very slowly.  we thought it was just another military test run (these were not uncommon) but when this thing got closer,  it was about the size of a very small helicopter and made virtually no noise.  i ran and grabbed my neighbor mark who was still awake watching tv and he came out and was amazed as well.  

this thing was only about 300ft overhead, was moving very very slowly (my guess is about 25-30mph?  we watched it get larger and larger and could not believe how close it was and how little noise it made for being such a large object.  not large by airplane or helicopter means, but about the size of a large suv or a very small helicopter.  

we watched it pass over head for about 3 minutes until it was out of sight.  we all kinda stood for a minute and blamed it on the military base testings that go on quite often.  we did however, assume it was a military spy drone being tested or some kinda freak new stealth helicopter type craft being tested.  

we kept discussing how quiet it was and how the lights on the bottom were in circular formation and not blinking, yet the underbelly of the craft was not able to be seen.  mark is a hobbyist in flying remote airplanes so he was especially tweaked about this.  his little b52 made more noise than thia thing.  it was kind of like a blanketed howl of a jet enjine.

the only way we could see the shape of this thing was when it passed overhead.  we then were only able to see the outline of a circular shaped object with lights in one circle around the base of it.  non-flahing lights  at that!  they were yellow and soft white only as well.  

it could have been a military test thing......But i figure if it was a ufo you guys would want to know.  either way it was a neat thing to see.  there were three of us (including me) who witnessed this.  it happened quite a while ago but i just stumbled across your site and figured you might want to know.
content.summary: Quiet slow moving ufo about 250-300ft. overhead

content.detailedDescription: I was 16 years old. i was walking to my after school job around 4:45pm. i stopped for a red light on garrett road, i forgot the name of the side road, but on my left was a catholic church called st. alice. i don't know why i looked up but i did and in the middle of the intersection about 10 feet or so above the street lights was this disc shaped object that was just there. i would say it was about a 30 foot round object. it was silent and all i did was look at it for about, i think, 30 seconds. it had huge windows with i remember different colored lights blinking. it wasn't moving at all or making any noise. i wasn't scared or excited or anything else. i remember there were some people walking behind me, but i didn't even turn around to ask them if they saw anything and i didn't hear anyone say anything about it. there were cars in the street but i don't think anyone else saw anything because it was so eerily quiet. all i did was look straight ahead and went to work. i felt like i was numb in a strange way. i didn't even look back to see if it was still there. i didn't talk about it until maybe a week later, but no one would believe me so i just kept quiet all these years. even today when i tell anyone, even my family, they just shake their heads.
content.summary: I looked up and it was there silent and 10 feet above the street lights

content.detailedDescription: I was heading into kentland one night to go and watch a tv show with my girlfriend. i left the house around 7:08pm est and began to drive east twords state highway 41 which is only about .8 miles down the road. usually i take a country road to town about .5 miles down the road in the same direction but i decided to take 41 just because. after i passed the country road that heads to kentland a plane and its lights caught my attention in the se sky or outside my passanger side of the windshield. as i turned my head around to look back at the road thats when i sall it. 6 evenly spaced out white lights lined across the eastern sky that appeared to have the same circumfrance as the next. i definiatly did a double take thinking what i was seeing was just a few aircraft flying in the sky since i knew that there are a few air bases south of home. but as i kept looking i notice they were not moving at all. they lights were hovering in unisin in the sky. then they faded out becoming dimmer then like a knob on a latern they became very bright again not moving at all.They stay lit for about 7 more seconds and that was it they faded  away not to be seen again that night.By that time i had stopped in the middle of the road to see if i could get another glimps but there was nothing. i had called my sister during the experiance to see if she could see it from the house but it was already gone by that time. i think i have ever been so exsided,scared and in aww at the same time ever like that. i finished the drive to my girlfriends and told her what happened she really didnt believe me but she said to me that she has not ever seen me that frantic before. so whatever it was it was definatly a u.F.O . wheather it was of this earth or not.. i don't know. if  it is then someone is keeping a good secret.
content.summary: 6 identicle lights appear in the eastern sky appeared to all be part of one major u.F.O.?

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were surveying some of the property at a friend's farm here in pa. it was already passed nightfall. we were making our way back out to the hayfield from the woods when my friend spotted a light in the sky but i didn't see it right away. i am not a very firm believer to ufos, though i kept an open mind to remain optimistic. so when she said this i wasn't really listening to her that well. especially after she said the light moved. i still couldn't find it.
where we were is directly below where alot of planes fly, both military and civilian, so there are alot of odd lights at night that turn out to be planes. 
as we hadn't planned to be out past dark, we didn't have a flashlight with us, so the stars were very visible from time to time. as we reached the edge of the woods i spotted a moving light as well, almost over us but north a little. i can't say how far, as judging distance of things in the sky is difficult. still, i was surprised enough at seeing it that i actually fell right off a cliff spraining my ankle. that held us up for a while till i felt able to walk again. we completely forgot about the light after that.
however, i only managed to make it to the field again before i had to sit down. actually, i rather laid down as i realized i was bleeding. unable to do anything about it i decided to lay back and wait a bit for the pain to pass. where again i noticed the same light as we saw before in the woods. this time it was definitely almost overhead, though still a little north. the only reason i picked it up was because it was sitting in a cluster of stars that formed a triangle with the point south. this particular light i hadn't seen among them before to my recollection, though i remember that group of stars enough times from summers past. 
i was just beginning to say, "hey, take a look at that star", grabbing her shoulder to pull her around so she could see it too when it moved about an inch in the sky. then it was like this halo wrapped around it from west to east, taking up, i'd say three inches of my total field of vision, and it was gone. it didn't go up or down move anywhere else. it was simply there, then not. 
i've never seen anything like this before, but i'm willing to say that wasn't normal, nor some comet or confusion from pain. i was on the fence about this kind of stuff before this but well, you have my confidence and support.

if you are looking for this location on a map, email me, it is easy to reach, but i wish to remain anonymous at this time. thank you and good luck!
content.summary: Object was sited among a group of three other stars. was noted for not being a part of them. to our surprise, it moved one inch in sky and vanished. color, very bright, deep blue-white.

content.detailedDescription: Sorry dont have time im at work but give me a call i have the videos and like 10 people around me witnessm it  but they were 30 red ligts with my boaculers they had like difrent liths around them
content.summary: It was 11 at night saw some red brigth ligts it  was like 30 by the time they stop got video and a camera picture

content.detailedDescription: I had walked out to my brothers driveway and was looking up at the clear night sky when all a sudden 7 lights, very distinct lights appeared in a semi circle or arch accross the sky.  the entire group covered probably close to a football field or more.  stunned i watched them for a minute thinking they might be helicopter, there is a national guard base nearby.  but there was absolutely no sound.  then i figured they were flairs from artillary, but i was in artillary in the military and flairs always leave a smoke trail.  there was no smoke trail.  i realized that could no longer see the stars behind the lights and new it was something out of the ordinary.  i ran back into to house shouting for my brother and wife to come out and see the thing.  i just opened the door and then came back outside.  when i got back outside the lights dissapeared as quickly as they had appeared.  no smoke trail, no sound, and now the bright stars were visible again.  my brother and wife missed the lights and didn't really believe me so i just blew it off.
content.summary: Seven lights in the night sky close to the ground, lasted about a minute to minute and a half

content.detailedDescription:
Sat night aug 1969 (could have been 1968) approx 10 pm.
walking dog on staten island. noticed what i thought might be silver blimp head-on giving sphere-like appearance. as it got closer i saw it actually was spherical with a band of rotating lights around middle. lights were green, yellow and red. no sound issued from object which appeared approx 500 ft in sky descending westward (from northeast). i felt exhilaration and a sense of shock. i tried flagging down some cars to verify sighting but no one stopped. object continued moving westward descending slowly, moving in counter clockwise motion,from my vantage point. sky was clear. object looked metallic. i could see what looked like metal or aluminum panels on the object.
it continued westward and disappeared behind wooded area near a golfcourse.
all my friends laughed when i announced that i had seen a ufo..So mostly i hardly ever mentioned it again!

recently, (in 1999) i worked with a waitress who said two of her girlfriends were in a golf course on staten island around same time (68-69) on a sat night and saw similar object hovering about 10 feet off the ground. then it ascended and sped out of sight.
apparently article in sun staten island advance recounted their experience, which i never saw.

also in 1953 or 54 @ dublin airport i witnessed (along with several others) a light 'dancing' randomly in night sky as though a light on a string.

my first sighting in late '40s (also witnessed by hundreds of people..Many  knelt and prayed as though it was some sign from 'god') it was incredibly high in sky over dublin ireland. was cross-shaped and slowly rotated counter-clockwise. it stayed sationary rotating for about half hour causing much excitement in the streets. 
i assumed it was a secret british airforce experimental airplane.
content.summary: Saw soundless sphere in sky over staten island ny in 1969 (approx)

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were out for a walk on a cloudy and misty night when an object that looked like a full lighted moon went fast by my side at tree top level.  this flat disc that looked larger that a basketball disappeared out of sight.  we came to the end of the street and started for our home.  suddenly at the corner came a flying saucer headed diagonally to the spot where we had been when this disc crossed our path.  the saucer was about 100 to 150 feet away and had lights spaced all around the entire rim with a lighted hump on top. it stopped abruptly when it saw us and sent spurts of air from its bottom to the ground, stopped and then did it again  i ran to my neighbors house and got the two of them outside also.  the lighted hump on this was delicate and lovely and had balsa like slats making a curved form.  in the quiet i could barely hear a very soft hum.  i happened to look up at the clouds and there in a small space between two clouds were two very small stick planes standing motionless along side each other and standing on their ends.  across and down from the top were long cross sticks the size of 1 to 1/2 inch from my far away view point.  as i pointed upward the saucer got mad and sent spurts out its bottom again.  as we watched the saucer started rolling over its top toward us and under again into the long shape of a cigar and pointed the front end toward the spot where we had seen the stick planes now covered with clouds.  at medium speed it disappeared into the clouds.  thinking about it later, perhaps we had seen the protecting shell that would fit on each side of this cigar to enclose it for a trip far away.

why didn't we report this to anyone?  because we were spooked by what happened next.  we went home and went to bed but we felt weird so we went out into our screened in porch and looked up toward the street light.  we felt like we were being watched so we dashed in, locked the doors and went to bed.  none of us told our family about this but the next day around 10am i went on outlook express to see if we had any e-mail.  instead up pops google with a message---"have you ever seen a flying saucer?  tell us about your experience".  i froze and called my husband.  we were concerned and didn't know what to do. we decided only our government could write and send us this message.  we must have seen something that we should keep quiet about.  we x'd off google and didn't touch the computer until around 2:30 pm when we found this message there again.  we clicked it off and the next day it was gone.  never before or since have we received such a message.  they must have seen my husband go home for the camera so they knew where we live.  the camera was out of film because of christmas pictures we had taken.  seeing is believing!
content.summary: 4 senior citizen saw flying saucer stop in front of them as they were out at night.  it sent spurts of air from its bottom to the ground, stopped and then did it again.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a break from work at budget rent-a-car in carrollton, texas, standing outside the facility. 

the clouds were moving quickly, but there was no precipitation, and they were underlit by the lights from the airport runway which could be seen across the hiway from my work.

after a slight distraction, i looked back at them, since they were the only moving things at night which could be seen. 

under them i noticed, hovering silently, a grey/metallic oval, also illuminated by runway lights. it was perfectly silent. my first thought was, "that is a ufo, it must be." it was an easy object to notice, since the clouds were moving and it plainly was not. there was no exhaust, no sign of movement at all, as if it had been let down from the clouds on a string.

then, as i watched, it began to move, just as silently. it was as if you could sense a power surge, although silent. in front of it was created some sort of light vortex which was colorful and as it moved, the color built up momentarily, then seemed to "peel off" around the streamlined shape of the object. the object moved exponentially southward in a line of flight that was seemingly straight. [the farther it went, the faster it went.] it was soon gone away.

i went back off my break and told a co-worker about it. there was no to-do about it.

next day i told another co-worker about it, and he reported to me that the dallas morning paper had reported 300 phone calls about an object over dallas that night. therefore, you see, i came to believe what my eyes had shown me. in fact, i reported this fact to another researcher on ufos in gulf breeze, florida while i was living in carrollton.
content.summary: Hovering over carrollton airport silently, zooms off exponentially, reported in paper next day.

content.detailedDescription: While attending the culinary institute of america in 1985,me and my friend were studying in the dorm room in the main building facing the hudson river.We were three stories up with the windows open when we heard heard a crowd gathering ooohing,awing and oh my goshing.What we saw was a approx 30 to 45 ft long cylinder pause atop the hudson river approx 500 ft from the rivers edge,it had 5 lights same yellow color on,then changed from yellow to green to red to blue to violet,then the straight clyinder went from floating horiz,to slowly vertical.The shape went from one straight vertical shape to splitting to three seperate pcs all illuminating different lights.I proceeded to making different patterns with different lights.This went on for at least 30 min.After it finished we went running out of the building along with several hundred witnesses.It floated over the main building and across the campus 60 ft up silent floating charcoal gray shiny metallic cylinder approx 15 ft in diameter,30 to 40 ft long.We watched it float away.Right after that airforce jets were in the air and private cesnas in the area as well.We know at least 100 fellow students saw the same thing we were stunned and nobody really talked about it.Thinking somebody would asked questions later ,no one ever did
content.summary: Light show to entire school campus

content.detailedDescription: I was preparing to cook on my grill and it was very cloudy no stars in the sky, i seen a bright oval light shoot across the sky under the clouds like a shooting star, but of course it couldn't have been that... it was way to slow also to be a shooting star but faster than a jet and no sound when it came across the sky.
content.summary: Standing outside cloudy night no stars and shot across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
First some background:
i am a pilot (instrument flight instructor) and understand the relative speed of aircraft at various distances and what sound to expect.
i was accompanied by someone who described exactly what we saw - immediately when we saw it.
i am a serious amateur astronomer who understands oddities other than ufos.
my mental state has never been questioned by myself or anyone.
my occupation is a high level executive with success throughout a 35 year career.

my friend and i were identifying constellations when the sighting occurred.  we were within the city lights of a small community.  while facing north, staring at the sky near the zenith, we both noticed an object coming from the north, passing directly overhead, and disappearing to the south in less than 1-3 seconds.  there was no sound.  understanding relative speeds at various distances, i know that if the object was to high to produce a sound, it could not pass overhead from one horizon to the other in 1-3 seconds.  if it were - let's say - 100 feet overhead, i would expect a sound.  but even at 100 feet, it could not pass from one horizon to the other in the time witnessed.

the reddish-orange lights were clearly separated by something that could not be discerned in the dark.  i am also a professional artist, who understands perspective.  the two-light separation appeared as one as it approached from the north horizon; separated as it neared overhead passing; and appeared as one as it disappeared at the southern horizon.  the apparent path was straight, from due north to south.

simultaneously, my friend and i looked at each other in disbelief and wondered if the other actually saw the same thing.  we both described - identically - what we had witnessed.

there is absolutely no question in mind mind - or my friends - that we saw what i have described.

i was more excited than fearful of the event.
content.summary: Reddish-orange lights, each end,  separated by oject that could not be seen in dark.

content.detailedDescription: About 8:00 pm i stepped outside into my front yard.  when i turned to return to the house i saw a ufo hovering about 50 feet over the house. it was very close.  it appeared to be black and triangular in shape with lights along the sides.  it made no sound whatsoever and did't move at all.  we lived near barksdale afb so i went in to phone the base to see if anyone else had reported this.  no one had and the base said they didn't have any aircraft in the area.  i returned to the yard and it was still there.  the wife and i watched it for about 30 minutes until it slowly moved westward until it was out of sight.  it was much too close to be mistaken for anything else.  the strange thing was that there was not a sound or a breeze or a movement at all.
content.summary: Went outside - observed triangle shaped ufo hovering over the house.  lights along sides - no sound at all.  moved away slowly after 30 minutes

content.detailedDescription: About 8:00 pm i stepped outside into my front yard.  when i turned to return to the house i saw a ufo hovering about 50 feet over the house. it was very close.  it appeared to be black and triangular in shape with lights along the sides.  it made no sound whatsoever and did't move at all.  we lived near barksdale afb so i went in to phone the base to see if anyone else had reported this.  no one had and the base said they didn't have any aircraft in the area.  i returned to the yard and it was still there.  the wife and i watched it for about 30 minutes until it slowly moved westward until it was out of sight.  it was much too close to be mistaken for anything else.  the strange thing was that there was not a sound or a breeze or a movement at all.
content.summary: Went outside - observed triangle shaped ufo hovering over the house.  lights along sides - no sound at all.  moved away slowly after 30 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking down 21 and 3rd with my wife and uncle on my way to restaurant when i noticed an odd triangle formation in the sky composed of white orb like things.  suddenly this orbs changed positions quickly forming kind of an arm.  i was able to catch some of the footage on video(i though i didnt casue they where difficult to see through the camera screen.  i have had previous encounters and this was really odd in the middle of the afternoon.  after trying to film it and talking they disappeared quickly (vanished). the next day i was watching a ufo show and they showed something similar that happened in england.  i posted this in you tube and many people have seen similar things

heres the link to the video i cant upload it now since its in my other mac.
will upload later though

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=8xdbntyxchu
content.summary: Orb like

content.detailedDescription: My wife & i were on our patio having a smoke and we noticed a steady white light moving from east to west at a 2:00 angle. we thought it was strange because normally the lights we see have 2or3 different colors (usually red or blue & white) but this thing in the sky had only 1 white light and it was nonblinking then when it reached our view of north it dissappeared.
content.summary: Unblinking white light

content.detailedDescription: I was fishing at a pond were i used to live one night about 10 or 11 at night. i was just looking on the otherside of the pond and noticed a light starting to glow.All of a sudden it got bright and came within feet from me. sat there stunned for about 5 seconds and as fast as i could blink my eyes it was at the other end of the feild which was over 100 yards long and faded out. no one beleives me.It was about 12 inches in diameter
content.summary: 1 foot round ball of light that came right to me and then moved 100 yrs in 1 second

content.detailedDescription: Well...I was out with some friends around 9.Pm  then i looked up at the sky and saw three red lights flying by.. they couldn't have been airplanes because of their speed and they were flying kinda low.  i saw them flying by for a few minutes.  since i was just sitting in the passenger seat i couldn't really stop and look.  i tried taking pictures of the lights with my cellphone but since in the moving car and they weren't so close it would come out too blurry.  well my friend just kept driving.. so eventually i just lost sight of it.
content.summary: Red ufo's in sky flying together.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with my family back to my home in fajardo,my wife and two children were sleeping in the car.It was a beatiful clear night and i had been looking at the sky ever since we got in the car.At first i thought it could have been an antenna for cellphones,but then i began to look more closely at this foreign object.I woke up my wife to have her take a look at it.She also saw it too.The object was oval shaped with lights around it and it was just stationary over a mountain.I was truly impressed with how still it was holding up. then after 40 something seconds it just dissapered.Keeping me wondering being there was a army base in ceiba which we were close by to.....Was it goverment testing or was it the real deal?By the way,the army base was moved out of the area way before i spotted this.I regret not having a camera phone at that given moment.
content.summary: Round disc with lights

content.detailedDescription: While hanging around with a friend of mine we both saw this bright light in the sky and questioned each other about it. my friend was an army reservist at the time and i went on to be an anti submarine air controler in the navy in 1980. we both watched the bright light hover there and wasn't sure if it was a helicopter or not.The light was like a magnesium candle and we didn't think it looked like a commercial aircraft. after watching the object for over an hour we decided that we would walk to the store and if we came back and it was gone that it had to be a helicopter hovering. we returned a half hour later and the object was still there. i thought that was funny because at some point aircraft have to refuel and can't remain on site for hours on end. as we watched the object it started to move across the sky at a great rate of speed. i can't be sure how fast but it was really flying. it then made a zig zag patern in the sky and as it did it was moving so fast that it left streaks of light behind it as it moved. the radical turns would have had such g forces that any human inside the craft in my estimation would have been crushed. it then made a final zig and them took off up straight into the ski and disappeared. i have seen many aircraft during my time spent in the us military and i have seen jets break the speed of sound as i watched them. as impressive as that is to witness i have never seen an aircraft that could zig and zag at such sharp angles like that. i can only assume that this was a ufo sighting and i can not account for the rapid motion or abrupt turns.
content.summary: I watched a bright light in the sky looking east towards the boston area. it hovered in the area for over 2 hours and then took off at an amazing speed.
